sen.j: 菊池 央（きくち おう、弘化4年（1847年） - 慶応4年4月25日 (旧暦)（1868年6月15日））は、陸奥国弘前藩出身の新選組隊士。
sen.e: O Kikuchi (1847 - May 17, 1868), from the Hirosaki Domain, Mutsu Province, was a member of Shinsengumi.
O Kikuchi (1847 - June 15, 1868), from the Hirosaki Domain, Mutsu Province, was a member of the Shinsengumi.
sen.cmt: May 17 ⇒ June 15に訂正しました。the Shinsengumi に訂正しました。
sen.e: O Kikuchi (1847 - June 15, 1868), from the Hirosaki Domain, Mutsu Province, was a member of the Shinsengumi.

sen.j: 名は英、央五郎、央（たのむ）とも。
sen.e: His names were 英, 央五郎, Tanomu.
He was also referred to by other names, Ei, Eigoro, or Tanomu.
He was also referred to by other names, Ei, Eigoro, or Tanomu.

sen.j: 弘前藩士の三男として生まれる。
sen.e: He was born as the third son of feudal retainer of the Hirosaki clan.
He was born as the third son of a feudal retainer of the Hirosaki clan.
He was born as the third son of a feudal retainer of the Hirosaki clan.

sen.j: 慶応3年（1867年）に新選組に入隊し、戊辰戦争では鳥羽伏見の戦い、甲州勝沼の戦いに敗退後、流山を経て会津へ向かう。
sen.e: He joined Shinsengumi in 1867, and after he defeated in the Battle of Toba Fushimi and The Battle of Koshu-Katsunuma during Boshin War, he went toward Aizu via Nagareyama.
He joined the Shinsengumi in 1867, and after he was defeated in the Battle of Toba Fushimi and the Battle of Koshu-Katsunuma during the Boshin War, he went to Aizu via Nagareyama.
sen.cmt: the Shinsengumi に訂正しました。defeated ⇒ was defeated に訂正しました。The Battle of Koshu-Katsunuma の The を the に訂正しました。the Boshin War に訂正しました。toward ⇒ to に訂正しました。
sen.e: He joined the Shinsengumi in 1867, and after he was defeated in the Battle of Toba Fushimi and the Battle of Koshu-Katsunuma during the Boshin War, he went to Aizu via Nagareyama.

sen.j: 白河口の戦いでは、新政府軍大将を討つ手柄をあげたが、同戦いにて戦死。
sen.e: Although he performed a feat that he defeated Daisho (Major Captain) of New government army in the Battle of Shirakawaguchi, he was killed in this war.
Although he performed a feat defeating Taisho (Major Captain) of the New government army in the Battle of Shirakawaguchi, he was killed in this war.
sen.cmt: that 以下を defeating に訂正しました。the New に訂正しました。Daisho ⇒ Taisho に訂正しました。
sen.e: Although he performed a feat defeating Taisho (Major Captain) of the New government army in the Battle of Shirakawaguchi, he was killed in this war.
He died at the age of 22.
He died at the age of 22.
He died at the age of 22.
